title: nee paadhamE
sahitya:
nI pAdamE gatiyanucu ninnE sharaNaNti nikhlalOka nAyaka



anupallavi



 tApa shamana dayAkara suguNa taruNamidi daya jEyuDaku satatamu



caraNam



 patishApamu cEta shIlArUpiyaipaDina vanita nija rUpamu kalguTa

 pAdapAmshulacE kApADina parama puruSa harikEhapura nivAsa
